Summary: Extremely bright light moving quickly, no sound, then faded to black.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around August 3rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw a very bright light in the sky, brighter and bigger than a star. Moving quickly, but not like a shooting star. Totally silent. Flew overhead, got very bright, then faded to black as it moved. The point where it faded to black had 4 lights in a diamond formation. Those were not as bright as the original light. It definitely wasn't an airplane or satellite.
